metadata.Description: Well organized and easy to understand Web building tutorials with lots of examples of how to use HTML, CSS, JavaScript, SQL, Python, PHP, Bootstrap, Java, XML and more.
metadata.og:description: W3Schools offers free online tutorials, references and exercises in all the major languages of the web. Covering popular subjects like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Python, SQL, Java, and many, many more.

content.text: Learn how to create a pagination with CSS.
content.html: Learn how to create a pagination with CSS.

content.code: «   1   2   3   4   5   6   »
content.code_html:
<div class="pagination">
  <a href="#">«</a>
  <a href="#">1</a>
  <a class="active" href="#">2</a>
  <a href="#">3</a>
  <a href="#">4</a>
  <a href="#">5</a>
  <a href="#">6</a>
  <a href="#">»</a>
</div>

syntaxHighlighting.text:
/* 
  Add a grey background color on mouse-over */

syntax_highlighting.text:
/* 
  Add a grey background color on mouse-over */

content.code_html:
/* Pagination links */
.pagination a {
  color: black;
  float: left;
  padding: 8px 16px;
  text-decoration: none;
  transition: background-color .3s;
}

/* Style the active/current link */
.pagination a.active {
  background-color: dodgerblue;
  color: white;
}

/* Add a grey background color on mouse-over */
.pagination a:hover:not(.active) {background-color: #ddd;}
